settings.title: Settings
settings.exportError: Failed to export data. Please try again.
settings.importAllDuplicates: All workouts in the file already exist.
settings.importInvalidFile: Invalid file. Please select a valid RepLog backup file.
settings.importError: Failed to import data. Please try again.
settings.backupFound: A backup file was found on this device. Use Import Data to restore it.

workout.emptyDescription: Start tracking your fitness journey by adding your first workout.
workout.confirmClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all workouts? This will permanently delete all workout data and cannot be undone.
workout.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this workout? This action cannot be undone.

addWorkout.description: Create a new workout session to organize your training. After creating, you'll define muscle groups and exercises for this workout.

muscleGroup.emptyDescription: Start organizing your workout by adding your first muscle group.
muscleGroup.confirmClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all muscle groups from this workout? This will permanently delete all muscle group data and cannot be undone.
muscleGroup.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this entire workout? This will permanently delete the workout and all its muscle groups and cannot be undone.
muscleGroup.confirmDeleteItemMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this muscle group? This action cannot be undone.

addMuscleGroup.description: Define a muscle group to organize exercises targeting similar muscle areas. Add multiple exercises to track your progress for each muscle.
addMuscleGroup.fillExercisesTooltip: Fill in all exercises before adding more

editMuscleGroup.description: Update the muscle group information to keep your training plan organized and accurate.

exercises.emptySubtitle: Add your first exercise to get started
exercises.confirmClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all exercises from this muscle group? This will permanently delete all exercise data and cannot be undone.
exercises.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this entire muscle group? This will permanently delete the muscle group and all its exercises and cannot be undone.
exercises.confirmDeleteExerciseMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this exercise? This action cannot be undone.

addExercise.description: Add a new exercise to this muscle group. You'll be able to log sets, reps, and weight for this exercise.

log.emptySubtitle: Add your first log to track your progress
log.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this log? This action cannot be undone.
log.confirmDeleteExerciseMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this entire exercise? This will permanently delete the exercise and all its logs and cannot be undone.
log.confirmClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all logs for this exercise? This will permanently delete all log data and cannot be undone.

addLog.errorReps: Please enter a valid number of reps
addLog.errorFailed: Failed to add log. Please try again.

editLog.errorReps: Please enter a valid number of reps
editLog.errorFailed: Failed to update log. Please try again.
